member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console.ConfigurationConsoleLoggerSettings.TryGetSwitch(System.String,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.LogLevel@)
member.summary: Gets the log level for the specified switch.
member.param: The name of the switch to look up
An out parameter that will be set to the value of the switch if it is found. If the switch is not found, the method returns false and sets the value of level to LogLevel.None
